00183         {
00184             return TemplateIterator (mTemplates.begin (), mTemplates.end ()) ;
00185         }
00186         /* Returns whether the Element with the given name is a Template */
00187         bool isTemplate (String strName) const {
00188             return (mTemplates.find (strName) != mTemplates.end()) ;
00189         }
